A bit about me

My name is Kish, and I'm a designer from London, UK. I love to leverage software and human interaction to build better experiences for consumers.

I'm currently at TransferWise, redefining the way people interact with their money. I work with the Mobile and Transfer Creation teams, helping to bring a frictionless experience to our new and existing customers.

You can connect with me in many places. I say stuff on Twitter. I show off on Dribbble. I connect professionally on LinkedIn. I take photos on Instagram. I write code and share it on GitHub, but store it on BitBucket. I listen to music on Spotify and I sometimes upload it on Soundcloud.
